channel.title: Tealblu.github.io on indi.bio

item.title: Site Documentation
item.description:
documentation for https://indi.bio/ (and https://tealblu.github.io/)

TLDR

This is a Hugo Extended (â‰¥0.83) static site for GitHub Pages using the Paper++ custom theme (PaperMod derivative) with Vanta backgrounds and animation hooks, Three.js/D3 for visuals, Hugo-piped JS/CSS assets (themes/Paper++/assets/js) including vanta-init.js, page-transitions.js and fastsearch.js, Logseq-synced content under content/pages and content/assets, search via a prebuilt index consumed by fastsearch, and production builds via hugo –minify (npm install is optional for JS deps).

Refer to the ReadMe if you don’t want to read the rest.
